b: ^Do you know what this device is?
^It makes pretty sounds, I like it!
^Are you off your rocker? I don't hear a thing!
^WTF is this thing? We've never seen it before.

start_farm_family_mother: ^That strange device has buttons to press, but it doesn't do anything.
start_farm_family_brother: ^Have you pet the chickens yet today?
